entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 40
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, INCREASING TO NORTH 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLOUDY, COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 7 ABOVE
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW

SNOW SHOWERS
MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 15
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 90 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW IN THE MORNING

SNOW SHOWERS
NEW MODERATE SNOW ACCUMULATION
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE 10 TO 15
CHANCE OF SNOW 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS 15 TO 20
CHANCE OF SNOW 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND ZERO

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
